org.drip.product.creator

Class SingleStreamComponentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.product.creator.SingleStreamComponentBuilder

  • public class SingleStreamComponentBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    IRFutureBuilder contains the suite of helper functions for creating the Futures product and product pack from the parameters/codes/byte array streams. It also contains function to construct EDF codes and the EDF product from code.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
